description: An illustration of a reddish-brown hat stand with four total hooks at the top; there is also a ring surrounding the lower portion of the hat stand, possibly to hook umbrella handles upon. The hat stand has four legs. On the top left hook hangs a beige hat with a wide brim and a greenish-gray band around the crown and on the bottom right hook hangs a beige scarf.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.

user.name: VertexArchive

content: December 15, 2023. Hang on to your hat. #NYTVertex
